title: Foundations of Machine Learning and AI

questions.question: What is the main principle of machine learning?
choices: Explicitly programming rules for every scenario
Learning patterns from data
Mimicking human intelligence perfectly
Solving only mathematical problems
questions.answer: Learning patterns from data

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of machine learning?
choices: Supervised learning
Unsupervised learning
Reinforcement learning
Cognitive learning
questions.answer: Cognitive learning

questions.question: In supervised learning, what are labels?
choices: Input variables
The algorithm used
Output or target variables
The training dataset
questions.answer: Output or target variables

questions.question: What is the primary goal of unsupervised learning?
choices: To predict specific outcomes
To find patterns in unlabeled data
To interact with an environment
To classify labeled data
questions.answer: To find patterns in unlabeled data

questions.question: Which type of machine learning is most suitable for a spam detection system?
choices: Unsupervised learning
Reinforcement learning
Supervised learning
Semi-supervised learning
questions.answer: Supervised learning

questions.question: What are features in machine learning?
choices: The final output of the model
The algorithm used to train the model
The input variables used to make predictions
The reward system in reinforcement learning
questions.answer: The input variables used to make predictions

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of reinforcement learning?
choices: Clustering customer data
Predicting stock prices
Teaching a robot to walk
Classifying images of animals
questions.answer: Teaching a robot to walk

questions.question: What is the relationship between AI and machine learning?
choices: They are completely separate fields
AI is a subset of machine learning
Machine learning is a subset of AI
They are exactly the same thing
questions.answer: Machine learning is a subset of AI

questions.question: What is a key characteristic of training data in supervised learning?
choices: It must be unlabeled
It includes both input features and output labels
It only contains input features
It is generated by the model itself
questions.answer: It includes both input features and output labels

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common application of machine learning?
choices: Image classification
Natural language processing
Mechanical engineering
Recommendation systems
questions.answer: Mechanical engineering

questions.question: What is the primary goal of a machine learning model?
choices: To store large amounts of data
To perform calculations faster than humans
To learn patterns from data and make predictions
To replace human workers in all industries
questions.answer: To learn patterns from data and make predictions

questions.question: In the context of machine learning, what is a 'model'?
choices: A physical representation of a machine
A mathematical representation learned from data
A type of computer hardware
A human expert in the field
questions.answer: A mathematical representation learned from data

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of unsupervised learning?
choices: Predicting house prices
Classifying emails as spam or not spam
Customer segmentation based on purchasing behavior
Teaching a computer to play chess
questions.answer: Customer segmentation based on purchasing behavior

questions.question: What is the role of the 'agent' in reinforcement learning?
choices: To label the training data
To interact with the environment and learn from feedback
To cluster similar data points
To provide the correct answers during training
questions.answer: To interact with the environment and learn from feedback

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key component of a machine learning system?
choices: Training data
Features
Labels
User interface
questions.answer: User interface

questions.question: What is the main difference between AI and machine learning?
choices: AI is outdated while machine learning is modern
AI is the broader concept, while machine learning is a specific approach to achieve AI
Machine learning can only be used for simple tasks, while AI is for complex problems
AI requires human intervention, while machine learning is fully autonomous
questions.answer: AI is the broader concept, while machine learning is a specific approach to achieve AI

questions.question: Which type of machine learning would be most appropriate for a credit card fraud detection system?
choices: Unsupervised learning
Reinforcement learning
Supervised learning
Semi-supervised learning
questions.answer: Supervised learning

questions.question: What is the primary challenge in implementing AI systems in a developing country like Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of interest from the population
Limited digital infrastructure and data availability
Too much competition from other countries
Overabundance of AI experts
questions.answer: Limited digital infrastructure and data availability

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential application of AI in Timor-Leste's agriculture sector?
choices: Automated harvesting of all crops
Predicting optimal planting times based on weather patterns
Replacing all farmers with robots
Genetically modifying all plants
questions.answer: Predicting optimal planting times based on weather patterns

questions.question: What is a key ethical consideration when implementing AI systems?
choices: Ensuring the AI system has a pleasant voice
Making the AI system as complex as possible
Addressing potential biases in the training data and algorithms
Keeping the AI system a secret from the public
questions.answer: Addressing potential biases in the training data and algorithms

questions.question: How might AI contribute to preserving Timorese languages?
choices: By replacing all local languages with a universal AI language
Through natural language processing tools for translation and documentation
By teaching AI to speak with a Timorese accent
AI cannot contribute to language preservation
questions.answer: Through natural language processing tools for translation and documentation

questions.question: What is the significance of feature selection in machine learning?
choices: It determines the color scheme of the user interface
It helps in choosing the most relevant input variables for the model
It automatically generates new training data
It decides the final output of the model
questions.answer: It helps in choosing the most relevant input variables for the model

questions.question: In the context of AI in Timor-Leste, what does 'digital divide' refer to?
choices: The split between AI and human intelligence
The gap in access to digital technologies and skills among different groups
The division of AI into different categories
The separation between hardware and software in computers
questions.answer: The gap in access to digital technologies and skills among different groups

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical step in the machine learning process?
choices: Data collection
Model training
Feature engineering
Manual coding of all possible outcomes
questions.answer: Manual coding of all possible outcomes

questions.question: What role could AI play in Timor-Leste's healthcare system?
choices: Completely replacing all doctors
Assisting in disease diagnosis and treatment planning
Only managing hospital administrative tasks
Providing entertainment for patients
questions.answer: Assisting in disease diagnosis and treatment planning

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential challenge in implementing AI in Timor-Leste's education sector?
choices: Students learning too quickly
Lack of electricity and internet access in some schools
Teachers becoming too efficient
Excessive funding for AI projects
questions.answer: Lack of electricity and internet access in some schools

questions.question: What is the primary goal of using AI in natural language processing for Tetum and Portuguese languages?
choices: To replace these languages with English
To create a new hybrid language
To improve translation and preservation of these languages
To determine which language is superior
questions.answer: To improve translation and preservation of these languages

questions.question: How can reinforcement learning be applied in Timor-Leste's context?
choices: To automate all government decisions
To optimize resource allocation in agriculture or fisheries
To control the weather
To predict election outcomes with 100% accuracy
questions.answer: To optimize resource allocation in agriculture or fisheries

questions.question: What is a key consideration when developing AI applications for Timor-Leste?
choices: Ensuring the applications are as complex as possible
Ignoring local cultural contexts
Adapting the technology to local needs and constraints
Implementing only the most expensive AI solutions
questions.answer: Adapting the technology to local needs and constraints

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the potential impact of AI on employment in Timor-Leste?
choices: AI will eliminate all jobs immediately
AI will have no effect on employment
AI may displace some jobs while creating new opportunities in tech-related fields
AI will only create high-paying jobs for everyone
questions.answer: AI may displace some jobs while creating new opportunities in tech-related fields
